devdoc.details: Diamond facet for creating and managing RestrictedCollateralToken instances

CollateralTokenFactoryFacet_init().details: Constructor - initializes the factory This is automatically called when the facet is added to the diamond

createCollateralToken(uint256,string,str.details: Create a new RestrictedCollateralToken for a trade deal

params._restrictionsEnabled: Whether to enforce restrictions on transfers
params._tradeDealId: The ID of the trade deal

returns._0: The address of the new token

getCollateralTokenAddress(uint256).details: Get the token address for a trade deal

params._tradeDealId: The ID of the trade deal

returns._0: The address of the CollateralTokenFactory contract (automatically created in the constructor)

isCollateralTokenParticipant(uint256,add.details: Check if an address is a participant in a trade deal

params._tradeDealId: The ID of the trade deal

returns._0: Whether the address is a participant

params._restrictionsEnabled: Whether to enforce restrictions on transfers
params._tradeDealId: The ID of the trade deal

devdoc.title: CollateralTokenFactoryFacet
